system.description: Effect: All valid targets lose -1 EVA stage for 5 activations. All [Hazard] and [Shield] attack effects in the attack's range are cleared. If Foggy Weather is active, Defog ends Foggy Weather.

actions.name: Defog
actions.description: Effect: All valid targets lose -1 EVA stage for 5 activations. All [Hazard] and [Shield] attack effects in the attack's range are cleared. If Foggy Weather is active, Defog ends Foggy Weather.
